actions.command: sh -c '[[ $SWAYNC_TOGGLE_STATE == true ]] && nmcli radio wifi on || nmcli radio wifi off'
actions.update-command: sh -c '[[ $(nmcli r wifi) == "enabled" ]] && echo true || echo false'

actions.command: sh -c '[[ $SWAYNC_TOGGLE_STATE == true ]] && rfkill unblock bluetooth || rfkill block bluetooth'
actions.update-command: rfkill list bluetooth | grep -q 'Soft blocked: no' && echo true || echo false

actions.command: sh -c '[[ $SWAYNC_TOGGLE_STATE == true ]] && pactl set-sink-mute @DEFAULT_SINK@ 1 || pactl set-sink-mute @DEFAULT_SINK@ 0'
actions.update-command: sh -c '[[ $(pactl get-sink-mute @DEFAULT_SINK@) == *yes* ]] && echo true || echo false'

actions.command: sh -c '[[ $SWAYNC_TOGGLE_STATE == true ]] && pactl set-source-mute @DEFAULT_SOURCE@ 1 || pactl set-source-mute @DEFAULT_SOURCE@ 0'
actions.update-command: sh -c '[[ $(pactl get-source-mute @DEFAULT_SOURCE@) == *yes* ]] && echo true || echo false'
